players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "This is terrible! Alice is dead. We need to work together to figure out who did this. Has anyone noticed anything suspicious?"
You: "I agree, Charlie. Alice's death is a clear sign the mafia is among us. We should all share our thoughts and any observations from last night."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Diana: "I already revealed Charlie is mafia. Bob, we need to vote Charlie out now before he kills again tonight."

Charlie: "Diana, that's a very convenient claim to make! If you were really the detective, why would you reveal yourself so early and make yourself a target? This seems like a desperate mafia play to me."
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you wait until the second round to reveal your investigation? That seems suspicious."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
